metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8294 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
libyara/re.c in the regex component in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) viaa crafted rule that is mishandled in the yr_re_exec function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara8 - 3.7.1-1ubuntu2
yara - 3.7.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yara package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1ubuntu2').
